message: One of the main tasks of a victim specialist, Darr said, is trying to understand the logic of the bond victims often have with their captors. Similar to Stockholm Syndrome, where kidnappers develop an affinity for their captors

data.description: The FBI uses a little known weapon in the battle against human trafficking — 153 victim specialists help survivors navigate the often difficult path back to a normal life.
data.title: FBI victim specialists fill a unique roll, helping victims figure out what’s next
